I hate on ay desk a photostatic copy of a letter addressed to you dated
February 4» 1954* and signed by Janos Ho Harris* Program Manager of Radio Station
KQftC in Corvallis* Oregon, This letter is written on the official letterhead of

bution by you and other members of your organisation* as m2! as by Mr* Morris*
This is to advise you that this letter is a thoroughly inaccurate report of a
talk given by me before the Oregon Audiovisual Education Association on January
29th« It contains malicious distortions* deviations from the facts* and is in ©very
way a deliberate attempt to do damage to my character and to attribute to me attitudes
and statements which may not be so attributed on the basis of any existing facts* In
short* this is a vicious attempt to perpetrate a damaging slander*
To permit this situation to exist without protest could to construed as acceptance
on my part of the validity of this attack * and I simply cannot do that* 1 therefore
call upon you to advise me by return mail of the names of all persons to idiom you
are and have been distributing this document* and to prepare at one® to purge your¬
self of guilt in this matter* If I do not get satisfaction from you and get it
quickly, then I will be forced to take such steps as will b© necessary to bring this
matter before the proper authorities and seek adequate compilation for the harm you
are trying to do m© with this vicious and unfounded slander*
I must say that I am shocked beyond words at the depths to which you and your
people will descend in response to the receipt of a letter such as that written by
Mr. Morris* Apparently no effort was made to check the sueuracy of any of the
statements contained therein* It is therefore evident tfcr.t there was no desire to

Very truly yours*
